index.subtext: Search the state's citizen and vehicle database, fill documents for investigations or court, and view a map of your colleagues and dispatches. All that and more is (mostly) ready in FiveNet.

features.citizens: Search and find information about Citizens, including basic info, their licenses and related documents.
features.vehicles: Search and find information about Vehicles.
features.documents: Search and create Documents, using templates or from scratch.
features.jobs: Infos about your job and employee management.
features.livemap: Live position of dispatches and your colleagues.
features.qualifications: Expand your knowledge by taking qualifications provided by your faction or others.
features.calendar: Public, private and job events all in this nice calendar.
features.mailer: E-Mail for quick and simple communication with citizens and colleagues.
features.internet: The World Wide Web, in smaller and more local.

notfound.title: 404 Not Found
notfound.fun_error: Seems like you got lost. Let's get you back to the start!

error.title: Error occurred
error.subtitle: A fatal error occurred, please try again in a few seconds.

logout.subtitle: You will be redirected to the home page in a moment.

dereferer.title: You are being redirected
dereferer.subtitle: You are about to leave FiveNet.
dereferer.description: Please note that you will be redirected to a website for whose content we are not responsible and to which our privacy policy does not apply.
dereferer.goto: If the automatic redirection does not work, please click here!

introduction.title: A better workflow
introduction.content: Easily search for citizens and vehicles. With the document access system it is easy to create and securely share documents with your colleagues. A Map that shows last few dispatches and your colleagues locations.

feature_one.title: Search State Data.
feature_one.content: You can search through citizens and vehicles. You can also set a citizen as wanted.

feature_two.title: Secure Document Sharing.
feature_two.content: Documents can easily be shared with your colleagues and other factions on the server.

feature_three.title: Map.
feature_three.content: See the location of your colleagues and dispatches live. Different map styles are available as well.

one.question: Who has created FiveNet?
one.answer: Galexrt and Clover, are the main people working on FiveNet at the moment.

two.question: Why was FiveNet created?
two.answer: It started out as a way for Galexrt to learn frontend development and then it spiraled into a way for ModernV server to have an alternative to VPC CopNet/ MedicNet.

three.question: Where can I find the FiveNet development roadmap?

four.question: I found a bug or other issue with FiveNet. Where do I report it?
four.answer: Please report on the Galexrt Discord server or on the FiveNet GitHub project.

questions_or_issues.title: Got any questions or issues?
questions_or_issues.content: Be sure to join the Discord server should you encounter any issues or have questions regarding FiveNet.

about.licenses_list: FiveNet License and list of third-party licenses used
about.subtitle: About FiveNet and its creators.

licenses.subtitle: List and information about the Licenses of code, libraries and software, used by FiveNet.

about.title: About FiveNet

features.properties: Set your job properties (e.g., employee marker color).
features.jobs: Setup your factions roles job rank permissions.
features.audit_log: An audit trail of everything your colleagues have done.
features.limiter: Limit what factions can see each other.
features.laws: Set the law books and laws for the state.
features.units: List, create and update units for the dispatch center.

common.name: Name

common.label: Label | Labels
common.image_caching: Please note that due to browser caching it can take up to 4 hours for the image to have updated for everyone.
common.search_results: No Search Results | {n} Search Result | {n} Search Results

publish_confirm.title: Publish {type}?
publish_confirm.description: Are you sure you want to publish this document? Once published, the draft status will be removed. This action cannot be undone.

data_error_block.default_message: Please try again in a moment.

confirm_dialog.title: Dangerous Action
confirm_dialog.description: Are you sure want to do this potentially dangerous actions? All data associated will be permanently deleted from our servers forever. This action cannot be undone.

file_limit_reached.title: File limit reached, cannot upload more files.
file_limit_reached.content: You have reached the maximum number of files that can be uploaded. Please remove some files before uploading new ones.

TiptapEditor.file_list_hint: You can upload files by dragging and dropping them into the editor or by using the 'Insert File' button.

document_comments.no_comments: No comments have been posted yet.

document_list.no_documents_hint: Either update your search query or create the first document using the above "Create"-button.

document_request_access.title: You don't have access to this document
document_request_access.message: But you can request access to this document using the button below.

reminder.description: Automatic closing of the document after the number of days. The number of days is counted plus the document creation or modification time.

auto_close.description:
Document reminders are only sent to the owner/creator of the document. The reminders are sent in sequence, each based on the previous reminder. E.g., reminder 1 (3 days) will be sent 3 days after document creation/last update, reminder 2 (2 days) will be sent in 5 days.
The reminders start again with the first reminder if the document has been updated in the meantime.

livemap.paused_datastream: Map data stream paused (window not in focus).

debug_info.title: Debug Info
debug_info.subtitle: Information important when reporting issues with FiveNet.
debug_info.no_char_selected: No char active, please choose a character and check again.

take_dispatch.title: Take Dispatches
take_dispatch.subtitle: Take assigned dispatches quickly or take dispatches normally.

dispatch_center.failed_datastream: Failed to stream Dispatch Center data!
dispatch_center.join_center: Join the dispatch center, by clicking here.

settings.title: Dispatch Center Settings
settings.description: Settings to change dispatch center usage and predefined settings affecting dispatches and units.

predefined.title: Predefined Status
predefined.description: Configure predefined dispatch and unit status reasons.

timings.title: Timings
timings.description: Timings for dispatch and unit status updates/pings.
timings.require_unit: Require colleagues to be in an unit
timings.require_unit_reminder_seconds: Reminder interval (in seconds) to ping colleagues not in an unit to join an unit

access.title: Access
access.description: Configure who can access the dispatch center and what permissions they have.

timeline.hover: Hover over the timeline to see the time
timeline.select_users: Please select at least one colleague.

startpage.content: You can set the start page FiveNet opens up on in your Account information.

documenteditor.content: You can enable a dark mode for the document editor.

template_editor_templating.content: You can use Golang HTML templating in the above field. For template snippets follow the link.

commandpalette.content: FiveNet has a command palette for power users, you can open it using:

sociallogin_discord.content: If your faction uses the FiveNet Discord bot, make sure to have connected your Discord account via the Account information. The bot automatically syncs your rank's roles.

settings_roles_list.content: Permissions are inherited from low to high grades. If grade 1 can view documents, all grades including grade 1 can do so too. If grade 4 is denied to view documents, grade 4 and higher can not view documents.
settings_roles_list.title: Information about Permission Inheritance

settings_roles_superuser.content: If you are missing permissions to assign or the list is empty, a FiveNet superuser must configure the available permissions for your faction.

qualifications.content_unavailable: Qualification content will be available once your request has been accepted.

auto_grade.title: Automatic Grading
auto_grade.description: If enabled, the exam will be automatically graded after the user has submitted it. If disabled, the exam will be graded manually by a tutor. The system uses the selected answers to grade the exam automatically (answer key is for helping tutors.)

auto_grade_mode.title: Grade Mode
auto_grade_mode.description: The mode for the automatic grading. 'Strict mode' gives no points for partial answers (e.g., all multiple choice answers must be selected and correct.)

exam_view.times_up: Time's up! Your exam will be graded soon.

label_sync_format.label: Label Format
label_sync_format.description: Should the name be longer than 64 characters, it will be cut off.

LoginForm.login_error: There was an error signing you in, please try again!

LoginForm.social_login_disabled: Social login requires you to accept the social login cookies.

OAuth2Connections.title: Social Login Connections
OAuth2Connections.subtitle: Your Social Login connections, for faster login and cool additional features.

char_lock_alert.description: Only your last online character, that was active on the server, can be accessed.

manage.title: Welcome to FiveNet Mail!

email.description: Your e-mail address can only be changed once every 2 weeks.

ThreadAttachmentsForm.document_title_warning: By attaching documents to an email, the document titles might be visible to the receiving party even if they don't have access to the document.

nic_registrar.title: NIC.ls
nic_registrar.description: Network Information Center handling the registration and management of domains and websites on the internet.

available.description: You can register the domain by following the steps below.

transferable.description: The domain is already registered by someone else, but can be transfered with a transfer code.

not_available.title: Domain is not available
not_available.description: The domain is already registered and not available for transfer. Please try another domain name.

builder.title: Website Builder
builder.description: Our convienent website builder will help you get started quickly with your website.

access.title: Access Control
access.description: Manage who can edit your website with our easy to use access control manager.

register_form.submit: Are you sure you want to register this domain?

not_found.description: Cannot find the server at "{domain}". Check the address for typing errors. If you cannot load any pages, check your internet connection.

discord_sync_settings.title: Discord Bot Settings
discord_sync_settings.subtitle: Manage the basic Discord Bot settings. To get started with the Discord bot, invite the bot, set your Discord server ID below, and configure the settings as you want.
discord_sync_settings.user_info_sync: User Info Sync (Names and Job Grade Roles)

group_mapping.description: Map one or more grades to a "group" role.

group_sync_settings.title: Group Sync Settings
group_sync_settings.subtitle: Options for the group sync bot.

ignored_role_ids.title: Ignored Role ID
ignored_role_ids.description: Users with one of these roles are not going to get groups synced (only affects the group sync and not the user info sync.)

qualifications_role_format.title: Qualifications Role Format
qualifications_role_format.description: Name format of the Discord roles created for Qualifications.

discord_sync_command_info.description: The /sync Discord bot command can be used to trigger a sync. By default Discord admins can use the command.

absence.title: Absence
absence.past_days: Maximum backdating of an absence in days
absence.future_days: Maximum days in the future an absence can be dated

discord_sync_features.title: Discord Bot Sync Features
discord_sync_features.subtitle: Manage the synchronisation features of the Discord bot (e.g., job grade roles.)

fine_grained_toggle.title: Enable fine grained job grades selection
fine_grained_toggle.description: Allows you to select specific job grades instead of a first to selected grade range. Enabling this option, requires the accessible ranks to be set again for the edited role.

effective_permissions.description: List of effective permissions for the selected role (please note to see the effects of your changes, you must save your current changes to the role first). The effective permissions are the permissions that are actually granted to the user that has the role. The effective permissions are calculated by combining the role's permissions with the user's job grade permissions.

fivenet.desc: Link to the FiveNet web app.
fivenet.summary: FiveNet is also available in your browser! Link to the FiveNet web app.

discord.name: discord
discord.desc: Steps to connect Discord with FiveNet.
discord.title: Connecting Discord with FiveNet
discord.msg:
1. Navigate to [your FiveNet account information]({url}/auth/account-info?tab=oauth2Connections#).
2. If the "Social Login Connections" tab isn't already selected, select it.
3. Click on the "Connect"-button for Discord.
4. You might need to login to your Discord account, before Discord asks for confirmation that you want to connect Discord with FiveNet, the "Connect"-button should have changed to a "Disconnect"-button.
5. Congrats, you are done! If you have connected the correct Discord account, the FiveNet Discord sync should give set your roles in a few minutes.

(If you have connected the wrong Discord account, use the "Disconnect"-button to disconnect the Discord account from FiveNet, and continue with step 3)

registration.name: registration
registration.title: FiveNet Account Registration
registration.msg:
1. Join the gameserver.
2. When connected and in-game, use the `/fivenet` command to retrieve your **registration token**.
3. Click on the registration token and your browser will open the FiveNet registration page automatically.
4. Now fill in the registration form, with an username and password, and you should be ready to create your account.
5. You should now be able to login with the chosen username and password.

(In case your browser doesn't automatically, [click me]({url}/auth/registration/) to get to the FiveNet registration page)

start-date.name: start-date
start-date.desc: Absence start date in form of either `today` or `YYYY-MM-DD` format (e.g., 2024-10-12).

days.name: days
days.desc: How many days will you be absent?

wrong_discord.title: Discord not associated with a job!
wrong_discord.desc: This Discord isn't FiveNet enabled. Please contact the Discord server administrator.

no_user_found.title: Unable to find your char!
no_user_found.desc:
FiveNet Bot was unable to find a character that is connected with your Discord ID.
Make sure to connect your Discord account with your FiveNet account and try again.

no_perms.title: No permissions!
no_perms.desc: You don't have enough permissions to submit an absence (Code: {code}).

invalid_date.title: Invalid date
invalid_date.desc: Please make sure that the date is in the correct format, and is not in the past.

failed.title: Error creating your Absence
failed.desc: Failed to create your absence entry. Make sure that all input fields are filled out correctly (Reason: {code})

success.title: Successfully submitted your Absence
success.desc:
Your absence has been submitted successfully.
({absenceBegin} - {absenceEnd})

already_absent.title: An Absence already been subbmited!
already_absent.desc:
You already have an absence for the same dates.
({absenceBegin} - {absenceEnd})

wrong_discord.title: Sync command must be run on a FiveNet enabled Discord server!
wrong_discord.desc: Either you are sending a DM or this Discord isn't FiveNet enabled. Please contact the Discord server administrator.

permission_denied.title: Discord admin permission required
permission_denied.desc: Discord admin permission is required to run the sync command.

start_error.title: Failed to start manual sync
start_error.desc: There was an error to start the manual sync.

already_running.title: Sync is already running
already_running.desc: Please wait for the current sync to finish before trying to start the sync manually.

started.title: Sync successfully requested!
started.desc: The sync should start in a moment.

ChooseCharacter.description: Permission to choose character, basically allow or disallow access to FiveNet.

CreateOrUpdateMarker.description: Being able to create and update markers on the Map.

CreateDispatch.description: Create new dispatches via the Map/ Dispatch Center.

Stream.description: Basic access required to see dispatches.

DeleteUnit.description: Allows to delete units via the control panel.

TakeControl.description: Allows an user to join and act in the dispatch center.

UpdateSettings.description: Allows to update the dispatch center settings via the control panel.

UpdateDispatchers.description: Allows to remove dispatchers from the dispatch center.

ListColleagues.description: List your colleagues (of your own job).

SetMOTD.description: Update Job MOTD text on job page.

ListColleagueActivity.description: View activities by types of your colleagues

ManageLabels.description: Manage labels to be added/removed on colleagues.
